thai: Pĕn pheụn ṭheu bai dū nạng
english: I am your friend, lets go see a movie

thai: Yū̀ dûay gan dtawn ṭheu ngăo
english: stay together when you’re lonely

thai: Fạng thuk rêuang raao thī̀ ṭheu rá-baai yaao jon cháo c̄hun gaw yạng yindī
english: listen to all stories that you let out, long until morning. I’m then still happy

thai: máe mâi châi khon phi ṣ̄et mâi dâai săm-kan săm-ràp ṭheu
english: even though not a special person, cannot be special for you

thai: Pĕn khon tho bpluk dton-cháo
english: am the person to call and wake you early morning

thai: koi fâo t̄hām láe hùang yai
english: watch, ask, and be concerned

thai: yāk thī̀ ja rū̂ ẁā ṭheu bpĕn ngaị nai way-laa têe ṭheu mâi lĕua krai
english: want to know how you are when you have no one left

thai: máe ṭheu àat maị̀ h̄ĕn gạn
english: even though you might not see us together

thai: nai bāng wạn thī̀ ṭheu maị̀ túk jai
english: on some days you feel alright

thai: tam dâai kâe piang kâe túk túk ỳāang thī̀ ṭheu kŏr
english: I can just be everything that you ask

thai: ja naan tâo rai mâi wâa mêua rai
english: No matter how long it will be, no matter when it is

thai: gaw phráawm ja yom tam hâi ṭheu
english: I am ready to do for you

thai: bpĕn thuk ỳāng h̄aı̂ ṭheu láew
english: I am everything for you

thai: máe wâa ṭheu maị̀ koie bpĕn à-rai gạp c̄hạn loie
english: even if you will never be anything for me

thai: c̄hạn gaw kâe khon neụng thī̀ ṭheu dtông gaan nai bāng khrậng
english: I am just someone you want sometimes

thai: dâai yòo dtrong nī̂ gaw dee kâe năi
english: can stay here, how good it is

thai: ja wăng à-rai h̄aı̂ māak māai
english: don’t need to expect too much

thai: bpĕn khon thī̀ koie àep rạk bpĕn khon thī̀ koie àep wạng
english: I am a person who secretly loved. I am a person who secretly hoped

thai: bpĕn khon thī̀ ṭheu h̄aı̂ khwām săm-kan nai wạn thī̀ ṭheu maị̀ lĕua krai
english: I am a person you see when you have no one to turn to

thai: bpĕn h̄aı̂ ṭheu daai thuk ỳāng dtàe gaw mĕuan maị̀ mī kwaam măai
english: I can be everything for you but you don’t have the same feeling

thai: tam dâai kâe piang kâe túk túk ỳāang thī̀ ṭheu kŏr
english: I can just be everything that you ask

thai: ja naan tâo rai mâi wâa mêua rai
english: No matter how long it will be, no matter when it is

english: I am ready to do for you

english: I am everything for you

thai: máe wâa ṭheu maị̀ koie bpĕn à-rai gạp c̄hạn loie
english: even if you will never be anything for me

english: I am just someone you want sometimes

thai: dâai yòo dtrong nī̂ gaw dee kâe năi
english: can stay here, how good it is

thai: bpĕn thuk ỳāng h̄aı̂ ṭheu láew
english: I am everything for you

thai: máe wâa ṭheu maị̀ koie bpĕn à-rai gạp c̄hạn loie
english: even if you will never be anything for me

thai: gaw c̄hun kong maị̀ mī sìt ja kít à-rai bpaị mâak gwàa nī̂
english: I might have no right to think more than this

thai: dâai yòo dtrong nī̂ gaw dee kâe năi
english: can stay here, how good it is
